hs:set.hs:correct_response_feedback: A Spanish speaker greets you with "Hello" (informal). You selected "Hello" (formal). This is correct.
hs:set.hs:d_1_feedback: A Spanish speaker greets you with "Hello" (informal). You selected "Good-bye." This is a correct way to take leave of someone.
